name: Conquest Cats
description:
As I've done this before I wanted to get all the systems down first which I think has turned out pretty well, it doesn't save and load however but hopefully it's enough to allow people to see what I was going for before letting the scope get out of hand.

Controls:
Left/Right click: interact
A/D or Left/Right keys: move camera
1-0: unit slot hot keys

Shameless:
You can support future development at my Patreon, here.
